item.title: Food? Please help me add food to my server
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Server Base: Iedge (untouched)
Problem: There is no food on this source and I would like to add it.
What I have found: Well, while I was look through the source for some
sort of healing or hp stuff I found this:

if (NewHP < 100) { NewHP = playerLevel[3]; if(refresh2 == -1) refresh2 = 8; }

and…

if(NewHP <= 10){ NewHP += getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]) / 2;

and…

public int NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);

Maybe those can help you to help me.

All help is appreciated.

Rep++ for the one who helps me the most/gives me the correct info!

Read full topic
item.source: Food? Please help me add food to my server
